hero.title: Break Language Barriers with Real Time Translation!

about.title: How it works
stepsContent: Install the extension from your browser’s web store.
Choose your preferred language for translation.
Start browsing play a video, and watch as it’s translated in real-time.

features.title: Real-Time Translations:
description: Instant translation of web pages, audio, and video as you browse.

features.title: Customizable Preferences:
description: Instant translation of web pages, audio, and video as you browse.

features.title: Supports Multiple Languages:
description: Translate into 100+ languages with high accuracy.

features.title: Seamless Integration:
description: Works directly in your browser without interrupting your workflow.

features.title: Privacy-Focused:
description: All translations occur locally on your device for maximum security.

questions.title: How does the browser extension work?
questions.answer: The extension provides real-time translation content directly in your browser, enabling seamless communication and interaction across multiple languages.

questions.title: What languages are supported?
questions.answer: We support a wide range of languages, including major global languages like English, Spanish, Chinese, French, and more, with regular updates to add new ones.

questions.title: Is my data safe while using the extension?
questions.answer: Yes, your data is secure. The extension does not collect or store any personal information, ensuring your privacy and security.

questions.title: Can I use this on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes, the extension can be installed and used on multiple devices as long as they support your preferred browser.

questions.title: How accurate are the translations?
questions.answer: The translations are powered by advanced AI, providing high accuracy, especially for casual conversations.

subscribe.title: Subscribe to get the latest updates
